verbose_text: Scholl et al [XREF_BIBR] showed that omeprazole with hazelnut-extract treatment induced hazelnut specific IgG1 in 3 of 5 mice (P = 0.754); and in the human study, 3.3% of patients receiving 3 mo of H2RA / PPI treatment also developed de novo allergic sensitization, which was higher than the reported prevalence of all tree nut allergies in the general US population (0.2% -0.7%).
evidence: omeprazole with hazelnut-extract treatment induced hazelnut-specific IgG1
